title: How to Reboot from Command Prompt on Windows

steps.title: Press ⊞ Win+S.
steps.content: Press ⊞ Win + S . This opens the Windows Search bar.

steps.title: Type cmd.
steps.content: Type cmd . A list of search results will appear. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Right-click Command Prompt.
steps.content: Right-click Command Prompt . It's at the top of the list. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Run as administrator.
steps.content: Click Run as administrator . The command prompt will appear inside a terminal window. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Type shutdown /r at the command prompt.
steps.content: Type shutdown /r at the command prompt. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter . A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Click Close.
steps.content: Click Close . Windows will now shut down and restart .
